dcterms:creator: Weizi Liu
Mike Yao
dcterms:description: This dataset explores gender identity and influence in human-machine communication, focusing on the impacts of gender biases in interactions with conversational agents.
dcterms:title: Gendered Conversational Agents

dcterms:creator: Rachel Adams
Nora Ni Loideain
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses indirect discrimination and gender stereotypes in AI virtual personal assistants, examining the role of international human rights law.
dcterms:title: Gender Biases in AI Virtual Personal Assistants

dcterms:creator: Campbell Leaper
Melanie M. Ayres
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a meta-analytic review of gender variations in adults' language use, focusing on talkativeness, affiliative speech, and assertive speech.
dcterms:title: Gendered Language Use in Human Communication

dcterms:creator: Jasper Feine
Ulrich Gnewuch
Stefan Morana
Alexander Maedche
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates gender bias in chatbot design, focusing on how gendered characteristics affect user interactions and perceptions.
dcterms:title: Gender Bias in Chatbot Design

dcterms:creator: Adam Bradley
Cayley MacArthur
Mark Hancock
Sheelagh Carpendale
dcterms:description: This dataset considers the language used in Human-Computer Interaction (HCI), focusing on whether it is gendered or neutral.
dcterms:title: Gendered or Neutral Language in HCI
